mapper.select: select p.imagename, p.product_name, (oi.count * p.price) as total_product_price, oi.count as total_product_quantity from orders o join order_item oi on o.order_id = oi.order_id join product p on oi.product_id = p.product_id where o.email = #{email}

select o.order_status, sum(oi.count) as total_order_quantity, sum(oi.count * p.price) as total_order_price from orders o join order_item oi on o.order_id = oi.order_id join product p on oi.product_id = p.product_id where o.email = #{email}
